H0.text: Which actor, who died in June 2014, provided the voice of Captain Scarlet. Donald Gray

H1.text: Which actor, who died in June 2014, provided the voice of Captain Scarlet. Ed Bishop

H2.text: Which actor, who died in June 2014, provided the voice of Captain Scarlet. Cy Grant

H3.text: Which actor, who died in June 2014, provided the voice of Captain Scarlet. Francis Mathews

A4.text: Ed Bishop provided the voice of Captain Blue in the Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons series.
